NeighbourHood Class Reference

#include <neighbourhood.hpp>

Detailed Description

A list of Neighbours.

This implements a doubly linked list. Though, it could be replaced by any other implementation (raw array, tree set, etc.), as long as it has the same public interface.

Todo:
